column4: My login isn't working.... I get an error and I get booted to the main screen
it worked before, but i just ran the automatic updater and it stopped working after i rebooted
log in on the text console and look for error messages in $HOME/.xsession-errors
Registering your session with wtmp... running :usr/bin./sessreg ...... Beginning session setup
just 3 lines, no "fatal errors" or anything
maybe create a new user ('sudo adduser test'), then try and log in as that.
excellent. i had a file ~/.xsession and it didnt like that
how do i get to there without a moues, tab isnt switching focus
didnt know about the ALT+F# , very useful!!
thanks a lot man, i got it all working now :)
